data.title: Middle Fork Baker History
data.text:
I’m Bill Baker (William Albert Baker), the oldest son of Oddis and Vivian Baker. I first created the original website in 2000 using my family’s research, and I am now perpetually updating and enlarging it as more research is done by me and scores of my online cousins.

If you have information you think belongs on this website or that might help us extend our known lineage further back in history, please email me here.
